item.title: Winter Route 2 - COMPLETED
item.description: Map html, body, #viewDiv { padding: 0; margin: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%; } #roleInfo { position: relative; z-index: 99; border-radius: 2px; border: 2px solid gray; color: gray; background: white; padding: 10px; opacity: 0.65; } #departure { color: #7893F4 } #arrival { color: #D43535 } require([ "esri/Map", "esri/views/MapView", "esri/Graphic", "esri/layers/GraphicsLayer", "esri/widgets/Locate", "esri/widgets/Track", "esri/widgets/Fullscreen", "esri/widgets/Legend", "esri/layers/FeatureLayer", ], function (Map, MapView, Graphic, GraphicsLayer, Locate, Track, Fullscreen, Legend, FeatureLayer) { var map = new Map({ basemap: new Date().

item.title: Calendar
item.description: hr { background-color: whitesmoke; width: 100%; height: 5px; } .calendar-icon { width: 14px; height: 14px; display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; color: black; } .calendar-icon { width: 14px; height: 14px; } .ic-arrow-line-right {} .zuaBtn { background-color: whitesmoke; color: black; } #menu { background: rgba(18, 19, 21, 1); border: double 2px solid groove; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0px 10px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.315); } Today < var cal = new tui.

item.title: Gallery
item.description: * { box-sizing: border-box } .slideshow-container { max-width: 1000px; position: relative; margin: auto; box-shadow: 0px 10px 40px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.315); } .mySlides { display: none; } .prev, .next { cursor: pointer; position: absolute; top: 50%; width: auto; margin-top: -22px; padding: 16px; color: white; font-weight: bold; font-size: 18px; transition: 0.6s ease; border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px; user-select: none; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8); } .prev { border-radius: 0 5px 5px 0; } .

item.title: Stats
item.description: var instance = {} Distance Traveled Per Meet. instance["distance"] = {} instance["distance"].data = "Winter Route #1, 16 | Winter Route #2, 10.2".split(" | ") instance["distance"].x = [] instance["distance"].y = [] instance["distance"].data.forEach((item,index) = { let j = item.split(", ") instance["distance"].x.push(j[0]) instance["distance"].y.push(j[1]) }) instance["distance"].total = instance["distance"].y.reduce(function(acc, val) { return parseInt(acc) + parseInt(val); }, 0) var ctx = document.getElementById('distance'); instance["distance"].myChart = new Chart(ctx, { type: "line", data: { labels: instance["
